contents.text: Thank you for calling Pantheon in San Francisco, where marketers and developers build, host, and manage powerful websites.
For marketing and site management support, press 1.
To get help with account onboarding and platform training, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our onboarding and training team.

navigationGoals: Quickly walk me through platform onboarding and basic site management features.
I need a walkthrough to set up and manage my veteran support website on the platform.
Walk me through provisioning my new Pantheon account and configuring user roles via the dashboard.
I’d like someone to guide me step-by-step through setting up my website and using the platform for the first time.
I want a step-by-step guide to set up and manage my research group’s website.

contents.text: To speak with performance optimization and analytics specialists, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our performance and analytics team.

navigationGoals: Get a concise performance review and recommendations to speed up my website.
I need help analyzing my site’s traffic and performance metrics to improve outreach to other veterans.
I need to optimize my site's CDN caching strategy and interpret Real User Monitoring metrics.
I need help understanding my website’s analytics and how to make it load faster.
I need help optimizing site performance for interactive physics simulations.

contents.text: For developer tools, APIs, and hosting support, press 2.
For API and integration assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our API and integrations experts.

navigationGoals: Help me integrate the Pantheon API with my CRM tool.
I need assistance integrating a secure API for veteran member logins and benefit lookups on my site.
Assist me in integrating Pantheon's REST API with my CI/CD pipeline using the Terminus CLI.
Can you help me connect my site’s contact form to my email newsletter service?
I’d like assistance integrating the arXiv API into my site.

contents.text: For hosting infrastructure and scaling support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our infrastructure support team.

navigationGoals: Assist me in configuring hosting auto-scaling for an upcoming traffic spike.
I need advice on scaling my hosting setup to handle traffic spikes during veteran outreach campaigns.
Provide guidance on configuring auto-scaling and load balancing for my Pantheon hosting environment.
I’d like assistance upgrading my hosting so my site doesn’t slow down when more people visit.
I need advice on configuring hosting to scale my site for conference traffic spikes.
